lead_paragraph: Members of the Congressional Hispanic Caucus say the federal Department of Agriculture will not adequately address their concerns as it faces civil rights complaints.

headline.main: Lawmakers Urge U.S.D.A. to Discuss Bias Complaints
headline.print_headline: Lawmakers Urge U.S.D.A. To Discuss Bias Complaints

snippet: Members of the Congressional Hispanic Caucus say the federal Department of Agriculture will not adequately address their concerns as it faces civil rights complaints.
